OrgName.entry: HOMELESS ASSESSMENT AND SUPPORT TEAM - SINGLES (HAST)

Desc.entry: Part of the NHS. A mental health service providing support and assistance for homeless people, or those living in temporary accomodation. The aim of the service is to help establish clients in permanent accomodation and assist them in accessing mainstream mental health services if appropriate. Self or any referral.
